mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product( store_id, product_name, product_price, norms1, norms2, norms3, purchase_price, production_enterprise, product_img, date, kucun, type, bar_code, bar_code_number, supplier_id, number, url, number_tow, type2 )VALUE ( #{store_id}, #{product_name}, #{product_price}, #{norms1}, #{norms2}, #{norms3}, #{purchase_price}, #{production_enterprise}, #{product_img}, #{date}, #{kucun}, #{type}, #{bar_code}, #{bar_code_number}, #{supplier_id}, #{number}, #{url}, #{number_tow}, #{type2} )
mapper.select: SELECT product_id, store_id, product_name, product_price, purchase_price, production_enterprise, product_img, date, norms1, norms2, norms3, kucun, type, bar_code, bar_code_number, supplier_id, number as numbers, url, status, type2, likucun FROM product WHERE product_id=#{product_id}

SELECT count(1) as count FROM product WHERE store_id=#{store_id} and status='0'
and type = #{type}

SELECT p.*, s.`name`, s.gname FROM( SELECT product_id, store_id, product_name, product_price, purchase_price, production_enterprise, product_img, date, norms1, norms2, norms3, kucun, type, bar_code, bar_code_number, supplier_id, number as numbers, url, status, type2, likucun FROM product WHERE store_id=#{store_id} and status='0' ORDER BY date DESC limit #{SHU1},10 ) p LEFT JOIN supplier s on s.supplier_id=p.supplier_id

SELECT SUM(p.money) AS money FROM ( SELECT IFNULL(purchase_price * kucun, 0) AS money FROM product WHERE store_id = #{store_id} AND kucun > 0 ) p

and number=#{number}

SELECT o.product_id, p.product_price, p.purchase_price, p.product_name, o.profit, o.receivable, o.num, o.cha, p.product_img, p.kucun FROM ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(nums * purchase_price),0) as receivable, IFNULL(SUM(nums * product_price),0) as profit, IFNULL(SUM(nums),0) as num, (IFNULL( IFNULL(SUM(nums * product_price),0) -SUM(nums * purchase_price),0) ) cha, product_id, revokes FROM order_kuncun WHERE store_id = #{store_id} and revokes='0' and DATE(date) >=#{startTime} AND DATE(date)<= #{endTime} GROUP BY product_id ) o LEFT JOIN product p ON p.product_id = o.product_id
AND POSITION(#{product_name} IN p.product_name)
AND p.type=#{type}
order by o.cha DESC

SELECT o.*, IFNULL((SELECT SUM(total) from supplier_order_pro s where s.product_id=o.product_id and s.revokes='0'),0) as receivable FROM ( SELECT IFNULL( SUM(o.nums * o.product_price), 0 ) AS profit, IFNULL(SUM(o.nums), 0) AS num, o.product_id, p.product_price, p.purchase_price, p.product_name, p.product_img, p.kucun, p.supplier_id, o.revokes FROM order_kuncun o LEFT JOIN product p ON p.product_id = o.product_id WHERE p.supplier_id=#{supplier_id} and o.revokes='0' GROUP BY p.product_id ) o

SELECT dday AS date, SUM(money) AS money, SUM(total_money) AS total_money FROM ( SELECT datelist AS dday, '0' AS money, '0' AS total_money FROM calendar_copy UNION ALL SELECT DATE_FORMAT(date, '%H'), IFNULL(SUM(nums * purchase_price), 0) AS receivable, IFNULL(SUM(nums * product_price), 0) AS profit FROM order_kuncun WHERE store_id = #{store_id}
AND product_id=#{product_id} and DATE(date)=#{startTime} ) a GROUP BY date order by cast(date as SIGNED INTEGER)
